Preprocess Module¶

This module contains functions for loading and preprocessing the data for the churn prediction model.

churn_prediction.preprocess.load_data(filepath, sheetname)[source]¶

Load the data from an Excel file.

Parameters:

  • filepath (str) – The filepath to the Excel file.

  • sheetname (str) – The name of the sheet to load.

Returns:

The loaded data.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

churn_prediction.preprocess.preprocess_data(df)[source]¶

Preprocess the data for the churn prediction model.

Parameters:

df (pandas.DataFrame) – The input data.

Returns:

A tuple containing the preprocessed features (X), labels (y), and the data transformer.

Return type:

tuple

e-commerce churn
